::Striker::

Savage's shots hit the Ark's hull, the metal finally giving and caving in 
with a huge clatter. Inside, Striker swears as the whole ship shakes.

"They never give up, do they?" he mumbles, taking out his gun.

"Allright, yet another battle!" he says, running for the exit, motioning 
Spears to follow him.
